content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the marijampolė district court the defendant is responsible for paying €165932 for stamp duty and professional fees while the applicant 2 is responsible for paying €113805 for stamp duty and legal fees in the final resolution the court awarded the claimant personal property including a car television set washing machine and tumbledryer the defendant was awarded a builtin oven microwave oven refrigerator and living room corner sofa the court also ordered the defendant to pay the applicant €3250 as compensation for the higher value of the applicants property the court divided the community property of a shared apartment assigning half to the applicant and half to the defendant the applicant was ordered to pay the defendant €13000 as compensation for the partition of the half of the apartment owned by the applicant individually the text discusses various articles from the civil code related to matrimonial property including asset balance joint matrimonial property termination of matrimonial community property obligations of spouses liability for obligations and guarantees for creditors rights the applicant sought the dissolution of their marriage division of property permanent use of certain properties compensation for a debt and division of an apartment the court partially upheld the counterclaim by the defendant and determined the division of property and financial obligations between the parties the marriage will be dissolved due to fault on both sides the claimant will be awarded certain property and the defendants name is omitted the court orders the defendant to pay the plaintiff €3250 as compensation for the higher value of the plaintiffs property both parties are declared jointly and severally liable for financial obligations to a creditor and the defendant is personally responsible for a car leasing contract the court divides the ownership of an apartment with each party receiving half the plaintiff is ordered to pay the defendant €13000 as compensation for their share of the apartment the remainder of the plaintiffs amended application and the defendants counterclaim are dismissed the plaintiff is ordered to pay part of the proceedings costs while the defendant is ordered to pay a different part the total costs payable by the parties are €52127
